column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Create a Balanced Scorecard
#Text=The format of a balanced scorecard can vary , depending on the data , the company and the industry .
#Text=Some organizations use a spreadsheet , or it can be outlined in paragraphs in a word processing document .
#Text=Some companies and consultants can design special software and databases for the purpose of a balanced scorecard .
#Text=Companies and organizations are using balanced scorecards during periods of strategic planning and organizational change .
#Text=They are used to evaluate the performance of the company , and assess what opportunities and challenges need to be addressed when outlining goals and objectives for the future .
#Text=Robert Kaplan and David Norton first introduced the concept in 1992 in a Harvard Business Review Article .
#Text=Create a balanced scorecard to improve performance and motivate teams responsible for an organization 's success .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Assess the mission and culture of the group .
#Text=Include consideration of the organization 's challenges , vision , and partners .
#Text=Identify the components of the change management plan that will need to be communicated with the organization and other key stakeholders .
#Text=Focus on customer needs .
#Text=Develop a strategy around how the company can best meet the needs and expectations of customers or clients .
#Text=Determine what value the organization brings to its customers and greater community .
#Text=Define the organization 's intent .
#Text=Focus on the mission statement .
#Text=Write specific objectives that correspond with strategy themes for what the organization wants to accomplish .
#Text=Map out the process .
#Text=Use strategic mapping to determine how the organization plans to complete the objectives defined within strategic themes .
#Text=Include specific values that the organization or company will bring to their customers and other stakeholders .
#Text=Develop performance measures .
#Text=Identify how performance will be evaluated , what standards must be met , and benchmarking data developed .
#Text=All results must be measured and expectations must be communicated .
#Text=Assign initiatives .
#Text=Make team members aware of their responsibilities , and how they will be held accountable for their performance .
#Text=Get team members on board with the strategic plan and the direction of the company by showing them the role they will be playing in its success .
#Text=Implement the process .
#Text=Use a standardized system to input and track the objectives and initiatives , and communicate results .
#Text=Custom software can be used , or a simple spreadsheet .
#Text=Any automated system that works for the company and is understood by all contributors will support the implementation of the strategic plan .
#Text=Cascade the scorecard .
#Text=The balanced scorecard used at a macro , organizational level should be replicated for specific departments and smaller groups tasked with meeting each objective .
#Text=Keep the measurement tools and evaluation procedures consistent for every objective .
#Text=Evaluate the scorecard and the process .
#Text=Review the balanced scorecard .
#Text=Evaluate whether the objectives are being met , and if the process to meet the objectives is working .
#Text=Adjust the balanced scorecard as needed .
#Text=The scorecard and the process should be kept flexible so that changes can be incorporated as strengths and weaknesses are identified .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Remember to keep the entire company or organization informed .
#Text=The best way to get everyone accountable for the success of a strategic plan and participation in the balanced scorecard is to communicate well .
#Text=People at all levels of the company should understand the process and the results .

#Text=While the process may be complicated and involve the dedication of company time and resources , statistics show that organizations using a balanced scorecard outperform those that do not use such a measurement tool .
